name: DarkHunter
description:
▫Game made in 10 days for the Black & White Game Jam. With the theme "Loop".

⚪Theme:

▫The theme was "LOOP" so player has to Loop through portals in order to complete the gam

⚪About:

▫The game is about an adventurer that is in an unknown location and has to "Loop" through portals, to be able to exit.

⚪Controls:

🎮

▫A/S/D/W -> Move

▫Space -> Jump

▫LMouse -> Shoot

▫ESC/ P -> Pause

▫Shift -> Dash

▫E -> Interact
